content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Sep 2019Will I be able to earn credit card cashback if I top up my GrabPay wallet using my cashback credit card?Is there anything I need to take note of?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 08 Sep 2019Short answer, yes.Unless! That card excludes Grabpay top-up. Otherwise, to the bank, it is just another transaction and it will reward you the cashback.But if your card has a minimum spend per month, do ensure that you hit it or else your cashback will be reduced.1 comment1
Question Poster08 Sep 2019Thank you so much.
